metadata.title: Re-enable Supabase Google OAuth on Login and Signup Pages
metadata.prd_reference: Auth onboarding/login flows with multiple sign-in options

context.background: User wants Google login implemented again. Current auth pages support email/password and magic link; Google OAuth was previously removed.

design_constraints.constraint: Keep email/password and magic link support intact while adding Google as an additional auth option.
Use Supabase OAuth with provider=`google` and route through `/auth/callback` preserving safe `next` behavior.
Keep auth CTA layout readable on mobile and desktop.

instruction.step: Re-add Google OAuth action(s) on `/login` and `/signup` using Supabase browser client.
Update auth page copy to reflect Google availability where needed.
Use Chrome DevTools MCP to verify `/login` and `/signup` render Google CTAs alongside existing auth options and no console errors occur.

validation_checklist.check: Login page includes a Google OAuth CTA wired to Supabase `signInWithOAuth({ provider: 'google' })`.
Signup page includes a Google OAuth CTA wired to Supabase `signInWithOAuth({ provider: 'google' })`.
Email/password and magic-link flows remain visible.
Typecheck passes and MCP verification is recorded.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Google login is available again on Healio auth pages without regressing existing auth options.
Task XML is updated with evidence and renamed `DONE_` on completion.

output_spec.commit_message: feat(healio-auth): re-enable supabase google oauth on auth pages

execution_tracking.verification_command: cd healio && npm run typecheck; Chrome DevTools MCP snapshots/evaluate/console checks on http://localhost:3000/login and /signup
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Re-enabled Supabase Google OAuth on login and signup pages while preserving email/password and magic-link options. Both pages use `signInWithOAuth({ provider: 'google' })` and route through `/auth/callback` with safe `next` handling. MCP verified all three auth options are visible on both pages and console is clean.

evidence.item: Task creation commit: f1e243c (chore(status): add HEALIO-090 google oauth re-enable task)
Feature commit: 06129e9 (feat(healio-auth): re-enable supabase google oauth on auth pages)
Typecheck: `cd healio && npm run typecheck` passed.
Chrome DevTools MCP: `/login` and `/signup` snapshots show `Continue with Google` plus password and magic-link CTAs; evaluate_script confirmed all options present; no console messages.
